name: Wicker (Shoddy Games)
description:
2D pixel puzzle platformer, drawing inspiration from limbo and inside by play dead

Made for the Platformer Challenge #2 game jam with the brief to "make a platformer which contains some destructible platforms"

Control Scheme

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys or Controller Left Stick

Optional Jump Key - Space Bar

Restart - R or Controller Select

Pause - P or Controller Start

Dev Details

Made in godot, my first time using it (long time Unity user)

Credits

Used kenney assets for lots of the world - https://www.kenney.nl/

Used sounds / music from http://www.freesound.org
